symbol.tooltip: An identifier or a constant

alternateSymbols.tooltip: An identifier starting with _ or a uppercase/lowercase letter following by 0 or more characters that can be _ numbers lowercase/uppercase letters
An integer is a positive, zero, or negative number that can be written without a fractional component (i.e. no decimal point places)
A floating-point number is a rational number (i.e. includes numbers with decimal point places
One single character
Any sequence of characters or the empty sequence
One of true or false
An array of elements
